body: As others said it’s technically not NTR, he helps his friends gain “confidence” by asking the girl he’s fucking to help out, at the end she gets all pissy saying i won’t pay attention to ur big dick for a month lol, they’re still together

So I created this account to tell you guys that I ran this through google translate, and I don’t think it’s a cuck story. From what I can tell the guy told his friends about her and they ask her to help lose their virginity and grow more confidence like she did with him. The guy apologizes and says he thinks seniors can help that way. She says “I won’t pay attention to your big dick for a month!” and then it ends.

@CreepyFatGuy I don't think he wanted her like that in he first place. I mean he just got out of a relationship and was using her to get better. Like a genie or something lmao. She was like therapist to him lol. His hentai logic brain. I don't think he wanted a relationship with her, which is why he told his friends she could help them too. So she winds having to deal with that situation and after wards she finds the guy and decks them for having told them that.
It's probably the guy told his friends that girl can mame em lose their virginity and in last panel she beats him cause that)?
So... she cuck him?... why? I thought Suruga only made wholesome doujins... sigh what a let down... I mean I like NTR but  a good wholesome not cheating doujin is good from now and  then...
It even has after in the title... Sequel... If u don't think so I sont know what your smoking or if Im smokin...
That boy fucked up big time sharing her with others
anyone know of a translated version or it too soon? i see its just been uploaded here recently
If this is a prequel, then hoo boy, she has another thing coming.
Oh yeah its the continuation/prequel to that other one with the same girl. Pretty short but solid nonetheless cant wait for the translation. Love this artist.
